entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 100010 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Financial Position includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities of 234,744,571 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 174,183,147. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 0. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-03-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities that should add to 234,744,571 are comprised of the following:
+ Equity 174,183,147
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 100010 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Financial Position. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities Total Value : 234,744,571 Total period : 2021-03-31 Dimensions : Decimals : 0 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1401395/000156459021036805/nept-20210331.xml 7638

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 100010 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Financial Position includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent of 146,103,143 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 206,664,567. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 0. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-03-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent that should add to 146,103,143 are comprised of the following:
+ Warrants 23,947,111 + AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncome 1,202,409 + AdditionalPaidinCapital 71,991,328 + IssuedCapital 379,643,670 + Liabilities 60,561,424 + RetainedEarnings -330,681,375
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 100010 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Financial Position. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent Total Value : 146,103,143 Total period : 2021-03-31 Dimensions : Decimals : 0 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1401395/000156459021036805/nept-20210331.xml 7631
